LanguageData.ArmyCall.label: Army Call
LanguageData.ArmyCall.letterText: A message from Army Command is being received on your comms console. It appears you've been mistaken for a new recruit.
LanguageData.CreatureCall.label: Creature Call
LanguageData.CreatureCall.letterText: We've received disturbing reports of unusual activity near the latrines. The sewage seems to be... moving. Something foul is stirring in the waste pits. Be prepared for potential hostile emergence.
